name: The Lord of The Rings The Battle For Middle-Earth
content:
files:
- official_patch:
    filename: 1.3_patch.exe
    referer: https://www.moddb.com/mods/bfme-patch-105
    url: https://www.moddb.com/downloads/mirror/49688/101/503d0a8da0b150d82034f107549c2fbb/
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/EA GAMES/The Battle for Middle-earth (tm)/lotrbfme.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- insert-disc:
    requires: setup.exe
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Installing official patch version 1.03
    executable: official_patch
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Setting OS as Windows XP.
    key: Version
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    value: winxp
wine:
  version: staging-3.17-x86_64
